name: schedule_appointment_ortho
description:
Appointment scheduling. Actions: slots, grouped_slots, book_child, cancel.

slots: Get available times. Returns ONE slot with bookingToken. Tell caller the displayTime.

grouped_slots: For siblings (2+ children). Returns grouped consecutive slots with bookingTokens.

book_child: Book appointment. REQUIRES: patientGUID + bookingToken. The bookingToken contains all slot details - just pass it exactly as received from slots response.

cancel: Cancel using appointmentGUID.

IMPORTANT: For book_child, you MUST use the bookingToken from the slots response. Do not try to construct booking parameters manually.
